review: I have owned this for a month now. The Amazon Fire TV Stick works excellent. With HBO Go added and Pluto TV, not to mention all the other apps, it is a must buy. I had one issue with blue screen error. I unplugged it for 10 seconds and plugged it back in and it has worked seamlessly for two weeks. Now if Pluto TV would add more channels, I could disconnect from cable.
